Uses of Class
ChatProject.CostumPanel

Packages that use CostumPanel
ChatProject   
 

Uses of CostumPanel in ChatProject
 

Subclasses of CostumPanel in ChatProject
 class FileTransferPanel
          The FileTransferPanel is the panel on the bottom right corner of the private chat window it basically needed to transfer files back and forth between clients if one of the clients wants to send a file he/she must click on the send file button which in turn pops up the JFileChooser the client selects the file he/she wants to send then clicks on the approve button of the file chooser that will send a message to the other guy for approval if he wants to get file he clicks yes otherwise he clicks no if yes is clicked the IP address of the client that is sending is extracted from the sent object creates a socket and connects to already listening server which is the client that is sending the file if no is clicked the message indicating of the disapproval is sent back to the client that sending the file in turn his socket will be closed and he will receive notification that his file was refused for downloading
 class FileTransferPanel.PromptFileTransfer
          The PromptFileTransfer class is the panel with two buttons that are added to the for confirming the file transfer this class is purely GUI
 class PromptUser
          The PromptPublicFileTransfer class is the panel with two buttons that are added to the for confirming the file transfer this class is purely GUI
 class PublicFileTransfer.PromptPublicFileTransfer
          The PromptPublicFileTransfer class is the panel with two buttons that are added to the for confirming the file transfer this class is purely GUI
